cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with a multi-armed bandit problem with contextual variables, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses the computation complexity and space complexity of the proposed algorithm, which are related to algorithms and data structures, respectively. Therefore, cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also a likely sub-category. The paper also mentions regret analysis, which is related to information theory and optimization, so cs.IT (Information Theory) is another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with control and decision-making problems, which are related to systems and control theory, so cs.SY (Systems and Control) is also a possible sub-category.
